item.title: Active Directory Domain Controller Deployment with Powershell
item.description: – Rename the Server 1 2 3 PS C:\Users\Administrator> Rename-Computer XOGS-E-DC01 WARNING: The changes will take effect after you restart the computer XOGS-DC01. PS C:\Users\Administrator> Restart-Computer Wait for the server to reboot.
